'Dry' is a memoir written by American writer Augusten Burroughs. It describes
the author's battle with alcoholism. Dry was written before [[Running with
Scissors (memoir)|Running With Scissors]], but was published second.
Dry reached number 24 on the [[New York Times]] Best Seller list for Hardcover
Nonfiction.

Although the memoir is based on actual events, the first pages include this
author's note: "This memoir is based on my experiences over a ten-year period.
Names have been changed, characters combined, and events compressed. Certain
episodes are imaginative re-creation, and those episodes are not intended to
portray actual events."
